data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Carenado - PA46 Malibu Mirage 350P
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Features


  • Includes improved default X-Plane 10.30 GNS430
  • Plugin-enhanced
  • FPS-optimized model
  • NEW! Scroll wheel support
  • DDS textures for faster load times and optimization
  • HD quality textures
  • 3D gauges
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Original HQ digital 3D stereo sounds recorded directly from the real aircraft
  • Advanced exterior HDR lighting system
  • High quality animated pilots
  • Customizable panel for controlling windows transparency, instrument reflections and static elements
  • Realistic night lights effects on panel and cockpit
  • Real behavior compared to the real airplane (Tested by real pilots)
  • Real weight and balance

Included in the package


  • 5 HD liveries
  • 1 HD Blank livery
  • PA46 Emergency Checklist (PDF)
  • PA46 Normal Procedures (PDF)
  • PA46 Performance Tables (PDF)
  • PA46 EMIS (PDF)
  • Autopilot and AVSS (PDF)
  • Recommended Settings (PDF)

data.short_description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
